page.title: 11LIFE IN BARSBY (2)
page.content: On a current landuse map it is noticeable how field shapes have changed over the years. theey have changed from being small, regular shaped fields often bounded by ditches rather than hedges. Many of the residents in Barsby are concerned about the detrimental affect this has on wildlife which would normally inhabit hedgerows. Bicycle used to be the most important form of transport, but it is of course the car which is now the main form of transport. it is noticeable how clean Barsby is and how well looked after the houses and the buildings are. Up to now there are no signs of vandalism of grafitti.
